name: Blair Witch Project: Episode 2 - The Legend of Coffin Rock
name_original: Blair Witch Project: Episode 2 - The Legend of Coffin Rock
description:
Blair Witch Project: Episode 2 - The Legend of Coffin Rock is an action-adventure game developed by Human Head Studios. It came out on 25-10-2000. It was published by Gathering of Developers. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Blair Witch Project: Episode 2 - The Legend of Coffin Rock is available on PC.
